Deemos just stares at him.

"Wrath, we could go and find someone to slag." =
Inzola said...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:44 PM
  Subject: R=
e: Neo Beast Wars


  Wrath: I don't really know......Damn... I never plan =
ahead! Hmm...I haven't been aound for to long...Hmm... *Wrath continues thi=
nking of something to do*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECO=
DE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:19 AM
 =
   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Deemos and Inzola walk to the jungle w=
ith Wrath.

    "Who are we hunting?" Deemos asked...
      ----- Original =
Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
     Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:08 AM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast War=
s


      *Wrath begins walking for the jungle*
        ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        S=
ent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 5:02 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
        "Yes, let's go." Inzola said to Wrath...
          ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups=
.com 
          Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:53 AM
          Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


          Wrath: We could try jungle? *Wrath asks Deemos=
*
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
    =
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4=
:39 AM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            "It's up to yo=
u where we start." Deemos said to Wrath...
              ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
              Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 4:27 AM
           =
   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              *Wrath nods and smiles* Wrat=
h: Where should start? *Wrath asks Inzola and Deemos*
                -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                From: THECODE 
                To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:50 AM
=
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                "Hunting? We =
hunted down almost everyone already, but sure, we'll come." Inzola said.

 =
               "Good to practice with our new beast modes." Deemos said. He=
 patted Wrath on the shoulder.

                "Those Alliance and Preds w=
ill be sorry they wouldn't let us join!" Deemos said. Inzola looked at Wrat=
h.

                "The Maximals, most of them just don't got it, but a fe=
w stand out, you are one of those few." Inzola said to Wrath...
           =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizard=
s 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturd=
ay, July 22, 2000 2:40 AM
                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


 =
                 *Wrath smiles* Wrath: Well......We can go scouting...hmm..=
..I've haven't had much to do...We go hunting? *Wrath asks Deemos and Inzol=
a*
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    Fr=
om: THECODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  =
  Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 2:13 AM
                    Subject: Re: Ne=
o Beast Wars


                    Inzola smiles and shakes Wrath's hand.

=
                    "Nice to meet such a charming and powerful bot upon my =
repair." Inzola said. Deemos and Inzola hugged for about 5 seconds and then=
 looked back to Wrath.

                    "So, what are we supposed to do=
 right now?" Deemos asked Wrath...
                      ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
                      From: ilovealllizards 
                  =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Saturday, July 22, =
2000 12:53 AM
                      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


         =
             Wrath: I am Wrath and you must be the Inzola that Deemos spoke=
 about. A pleasure to meet you. *Wrath extends his hand for a hand shake*
 =
                       ----- Original Message ----- 
                      =
  From: THECODE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          =
              Sent: Saturday, July 22, 2000 12:20 AM
                      =
  Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                        Deemos looked at the CR=
 Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked around.

              =
          "Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laug=
hed.

                        "Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

         =
               Gangon's spark is still waiting.

                        Ar=
tist runs around in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exercise=
s him. He runs away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into t=
he mountain and an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts pa=
ss through his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

                        "Oh, =
that was some blow, but I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

             =
           "Plintissa? Where are you my love? Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Ar=
tist called out. He remembered that she was in the desert. His comm unit an=
d compass were working, so he ran to Plintissa. Plintissa looked up at him =
coldly.

                        "Plintissa dear? You don't remember me? Fo=
r me death was near." Artist said. Plintissa looked up in shock and flew in=
to Artist's arms. Artist laughed and they kissed. After the kiss.

        =
                "Do me a favor, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said.=
 She kissed him.

                        "Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have =
a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both laughed and Artist took Plintiss=
a to a grassy plain.

                        Dracona held up her scanning =
device in front of Scorponok's face.

                        "I can find t=
hat device I lost." Dracona said.

                        "Then I'll give =
it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my blaster, it is an ice gun." Dracona=
 said. She looked at Scorponok with big beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesi=
s stared at her, mouths agape.

                        The Radicons sat th=
ere still...
